subtitle: Add your favourite toppings. Keep pizza dough mix in your store cupboard as a good meal standby when you're in a hurry.

method.text: Put the flour, yeast and salt into a bowl and mix well. Add the olive oil and sufficient water to bind to a soft dough.
Knead on a floured surface for 5-10 min until smooth and elastic.
Return to the bowl, cover and leave in a warm place to rise.
When the dough has doubled in size turn onto a floured surface and knead.
Roll out or divide into 2 portions and roll out. Place a baking tray in the oven to heat.
Spread your favourite toppings on the pizza bases.
Transfer to the hot baking tray and bake for 15-20 min.

title: Basic pizza dough
